segments.text: Good morning , sir . Could I be of any service to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you got any Chinese paintings ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we have landscape paintings , figure paintings and flower-and-bird paintings .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . How about this picture of cranes with pine trees ? It was painted by a famous Chinese painter in King Dynasty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , they look just like live cranes . I like this picture very much . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a lot of money . But the picture is excellent , I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S2
